Package model.bike

Class BikeManager

java.lang.Object
model.bike.BikeManager
public class BikeManager
extends java.lang.Object
Model to manage all bikes and handle database connections that related to bikes' info
Author:
Bui Tu Hoang, mHoang99

creted at: 20/12/2020

project name: EBR

teacher's name: Dr. Nguyen Thi Thu Trang

class name: TT.CNTT ICT 02 - K62
